info.title: NAITEI-PHP-T8-NHOM4 API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the E-commerce project, providing endpoints for products, orders, and more.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all orders with filtering and sorting capabilities.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by order ID, customer name or email

post.description: Creates a new order for a specified user with a list of products.

get.summary: [Admin] Get a single order by ID
get.description: Returns detailed information for a specific order, including order items and user info.

put.description: Updates the status of a specific order and handles stock restoration on cancellation.

422.description: Validation error or invalid status transition

get.description: Returns paginated list of products with filtering and sorting options

parameters.description: Filter by stock availability (1 for in stock only)

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product including reviews

put.description: Updates a product with the provided information

get.description: Returns paginated list of products for a specific category
